head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PALME, ROBERT JAMES

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PALME, ROBERT JAMES

block.p: PALME--Robert James, on January 10th. Beloved Husband of Leslie. Devoted son of Hansell. Cherished father of Graham, Katherine and Jenna. Dear Brother of Elizabeth, John, and Nancy. Memorial services to be held Sunday, 2pm at the First Presbyterian Church, 124 Henry Street, Brooklyn Heights, NY. Donations may be made to The Prospect Park Alliance, and The Brooklyn Public Library.
